basics.name: Neetu Roy Chanamthabam
basics.title: Senior IT Project Manager and Lead
basics.summary: Senior IT Project Manager and Lead with 14 years delivering banking/FinServ transformations[cite: 4]. [cite_start]Expertise in Agile, DevOps, and hybrid Waterfall delivery across multiple streams with 50+ stakeholders[cite: 5]. [cite_start]AI-enabled using ChatGPT and Gemini to accelerate planning, risk management, and decision-making[cite: 6]. [cite_start]International exposure (India, US) with strong budgeting, scheduling, and governance[cite: 7].

experience.title: Assistant Vice President - Project Manager / Delivery Lead
experience.company: Barclays Global Service Center, Pune, India
highlights: Scope, governance & cost savings: defined program scope and delivery strategy; targeted cost savings via automation and streamlined processes[cite: 13].
Delivery efficiency: managed ETL workloads and cross-stream communications; allocated resources to hit milestone targets within budget[cite: 14].
AI-driven delivery: leveraged AI for risk assessment and test optimisation; reduced rework and testing cycles[cite: 15].
Stakeholder integration: coordinated 20-30 downstream integrations and data flows across multiple teams[cite: 16].

experience.title: Technical Project Manager / Scrum Master
highlights: Stakeholder engagement: led client workshops, SOW planning; weekly progress dashboards for milestones[cite: 19].
Release & continuous improvement: orchestrated releases, removed impediments, and drove process improvements[cite: 20].

experience.title: Consultant Specialist (Delivery Lead / Scrum Master)
experience.company: HSBC Technology India Ltd., Pune & New York
experience.tech: Delivered multiple key programs over 13 years.
highlights: SSDML Integration (2020-2024): automated data transfers to 200+ downstream systems; reduced manual effort and data latency[cite: 22].
Global Platform Replacement (2017-2020): eliminated dual-entry and EUC inefficiencies; improved governance and data quality[cite: 24].
Reuters TOF Demise (2019-2020): Java adapter development; reduced third-party costs[cite: 25].
NORKOM Reconciliation (2016-2017): requirements gathering, data profiling... onsite delivery in New York[cite: 26].
Growth: progressed from developer to team lead; mentored 50+ professionals; delivered on time with quality[cite: 28].
